file_content.text: More vermin. My garden has grown wild, its beauty sullied by pests and weeds. Only the World Razer can prune away this filth.
The World Razer stirs. Its groans shatter these walls. Soon the levy will break, and we will wash over the stars.
Your plan ends here.
That won't happen.
You can never control the World Razer. You must realize this.
This is getting out of hand.
My sovereignty is boundless.
The only place you're going is back in your cell.
I'm putting you away for good.
The Builders' shackles cannot restrain a king.
Great plan. Too bad you're not going to be around to see it.
You're going down.
Your meager flame cannot burn our inferno.
Gore Claw, I presume?
You must be the leader.
Your unclean tongue turns my name into ash. Speak it no more.
You've already freed the World Razer?
Am I too late?
You came in search of victory, but only defeat and death wait for you now.
Now this is priceless--backed into a corner, surrounded by filth.... Looks awfully familiar.
There you are. I knew I saved your skin for a reason.
Now you can finally repay me.
I make a point of settling my debts... as these creatures are about to find out.
You again?
Ugh.
Your gratitude is overwhelming.
Just shut up and help me kill these guys.
Less talking. More killing.
After you.
A new dawn approaches. We shall march to the beat of the World Razer's heart and trample you under our feet.
